typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Kenteken as string,
		Merk as string,
		Handelsbenaming as string,
		Datumaanvangtenaamstelling as date,
		DatumeersteafgifteNederland as date,
		Datumeerstetoelating as date,
		VervaldatumAPK as date,
		updated as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> temprdwdata
temprdwdata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Kenteken as string,
		Merk as string,
		Handelsbenaming as string,
		Datumaanvangtenaamstelling as date,
		DatumeersteafgifteNederland as date,
		Datumeerstetoelating as date,
		VervaldatumAPK as date,
		updated as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> rdwdata
